notes.title: Authors contribution
notes.p: AG, YG, MH, and BA set up the collaborative network. AG, AMVC, FS, and KE designed the study. AG, AMVC, and FS coordinated the work. AMVC took the lead in drafting the manuscript and interpreting the results. AG and FS developed the statistical methods. AMVC, AG, and FS conducted the statistical analysis. AG, KE, BA, AH, FS, and VH provided substantial scientific input in interpreting the results and drafting the manuscript. YG, ST, MSZSC, PHNS, EL, PMC, NVO, HKan, SO, JK, JJKJ, NRIR, MP, PGG, AZek, PM, MS, MHas, YH, MHur, JCCC, XS, HKim, AT, CI, BF, DOA, MSR, YLG, CFW, AZan, JS, MLB, TND, DDV, CH, SV, and SH provided the data, and contributed to the interpretation of the results and to the submitted version of the manuscript.
